discourse_list.title: Paying rent with deposits - Cross-post from ethresear.ch

content.content: Posted by @Arachnid on http://ethresearh.ch:    Ethereum Research – 12 Jun 18    Paying rent with deposits Thinking about storage rent - what about requiring a deposit for all storage used, instead of a rental fee? The deposit can be refunded in its entirety when storage is freed up, and provides a direct financial incentive to free up unused storage,... Reading time: 4 mins 🕑 Likes: 15 ❤
